story_arceus_03_01000/2401_1001_0300_10: Yeah. I’ve been practicing in my free time.
story_arceus_03_01000/2401_1001_0400_10:
It has the added benefit of making my Pokémon
happy, too.
story_arceus_03_01000/2401_1001_0500_10:
Thanks again for teaching me to cook.
I truly am grateful.
story_arceus_03_01000/2401_1001_0600_10: Heheh! Then it was worth it!
story_arceus_03_01000/2401_1001_0800_10: Which of those Pokémon is your best buddy?
story_arceus_03_01000/2401_1001_0900_10: My number one’s Mabosstiff, of course.
story_arceus_03_01000/2401_1001_1000_10: Just curious if you had a Pokémon like that too, N.
story_arceus_03_01000/2401_1001_1200_10: It’d be hard for me to rank my friends.
story_arceus_03_01000/2401_1001_1300_10:
Zekrom... Reshiram... And Zoroark and the
others...
story_arceus_03_01000/2401_1001_1400_10:
I’ve precious memories with all of them,
and they’ve come to my aid numerous times.
story_arceus_03_01000/2401_1001_1500_10:
Kyurem is a special Pokémon Hilbert left in
my care.
story_arceus_03_01000/2401_1001_1600_10: But that doesn’t mean I treat it any different.
story_arceus_03_01000/2401_1001_1700_10: I’d have to say it’s impossible to choose.
story_arceus_03_01000/2401_1001_1800_10: Which Pokémon do you rely on most of all?
story_arceus_03_01000/2401_1001_2100_10:
I simply couldn’t resist this fascinating
conversation!
story_arceus_03_01000/2401_1001_2200_10:
You were eavesdropping? Pretty rude,
if you ask me.
story_arceus_03_01000/2401_1001_2300_10: Oh no, not at all! That wasn’t my intent!
story_arceus_03_01000/2401_1001_2400_10: What do you think, then, Volo?
story_arceus_03_01000/2401_1001_2500_10:
Well... You say you treat all your friends and
Pokémon equally.
story_arceus_03_01000/2401_1001_2800_10: I doubt you’re forging a true bond that way.
story_arceus_03_01000/2401_1001_2900_10:
In other words, can you really say you love
your Pokémon?
story_arceus_03_01000/2401_1001_3100_10:
Or is it mere hypocrisy—an attempt to make
others like you?
story_arceus_03_01000/2401_1001_3300_10:
N, I’ve heard you wish to become the bridge
between Pokémon and humans!
story_arceus_03_01000/2401_1001_3400_10:
If so, I wonder if someone who hasn’t forged a
true bond is fit for that role.
story_arceus_03_01000/2401_1001_3500_10:
And as for who better exemplifies an ideal
relationship with Pokémon...
story_arceus_03_01000/2401_1001_3600_10: I’d say this sync pair right here’s a better fit.
story_arceus_03_01000/2401_1001_3900_10: It’s OK, Arven. Volo has a point.
story_arceus_03_01000/2401_1001_4000_10: However, I assure you I’m no hypocrite.
story_arceus_03_01000/2401_1001_4100_10: How can I prove to you my love for Pokémon?
story_arceus_03_01000/2401_1001_4200_10: Oh, I know the perfect way!
story_arceus_03_01000/2401_1001_4300_10:
Just deepen your bond with your Pokémon and
attain an arc suit!
story_arceus_03_01000/2401_1001_4500_10:
If your bond’s recognized by Arceus, a Pokémon
deity, it’d be undeniable proof!
story_arceus_03_01000/2401_1001_4700_10: I’ll do it. l’ll awaken my arc suit.
story_arceus_03_01000/2401_1001_4800_10:
Oho! Such conviction! This should be something to
look forward to!
story_arceus_03_01000/2401_1001_5000_10: Hmph! What’s that guy’s deal? What a jerk.
story_arceus_03_01000/2401_1001_5200_10:
I think he cares so much about Pokémon, he let
his feelings get the better of him.
